resources.string: Eduteca is a project aimed at developing a web page service and mobile app that aims to create a unique environment, aimed directly at optimizing physical book search -mainly through the integration of libraries of the city of Indaiatuba-; but also, on the opportunity to allow communication and virtual interaction between readers and their ideas.
Follow us on social networks and keep up with all the news!
Leave your feedback regarding the Eduteca project!
